title: Harold Budd Discography (Repackaged)
description:
Fixed some tags, added new releases, re-ripped two albums that turned out to be V1 instead of V0. Now this collection is even more perfect! :)


1978 - Harold Budd - The Pavilion Of Dreams
1980 - Harold Budd & Brian Eno - Ambient 2 The Plateaux Of Mirror
1984 - Harold Budd & Brian Eno - The Pearl
1986 - Harold Budd & Cocteau Twins - The Moon And The Melodies
1986 - Harold Budd - Lovely Thunder
1987 - Harold Budd - The White Arcades
1989 - Harold Budd - The Serpent (In Quicksilver) - Abandoned Cities
1991 - Harold Budd - By The Dawn's Early Light
1992 - Harold Budd, Ruben Garcia & Daniel Lentz - Music For 3 Pianos
1994 - Andy Partridge & Harold Budd - Through The Hill
1994 - Harold Budd with Zeitgeist - She Is A Phantom
1995 - Harold Budd & Hector Zazou - Glyph
1995 - Harold Budd - Agua
1996 - Harold Budd & Hector Zazou - Glyph Remixes (not a V0 rip, only available in 224 CBR)
1996 - Harold Budd - Luxa
2000 - Harold Budd - The Room
2002 - Harold Budd, Bill Nelson & Fila Brazillia - Three White Roses & A Budd
2003 - Harold Budd - La Bella Vista
2003 - John Foxx & Harold Budd - Translucence - Drift Music
2004 - Harold Budd - Avalon Sutra
2005 - Eraldo Bernocchi & Harold Budd - Music For 'Fragments From The Inside'
2005 - Robin Guthrie & Harold Budd - Mysterious Skin OST
2007 - Robin Guthrie & Harold Budd - After The Night Falls
2007 - Robin Guthrie & Harold Budd - Before The Day Breaks
2008 - Harold Budd & Clive Wright - A Song For Lost Blossoms
2009 - Harold Budd & Clive Wright - Candylion
